mapper.select: SELECT /* PaymentMapper.selectPaymentListByOrderNo */ PAYMENT_NO , ORDER_NO , PAYMENT_TYPE , PG_TYPE , PAYMENT_METHOD , PAYMENT_AMOUNT , TID , APPROVAL_NO , REMAIN_REFUNDABLE_AMOUNT , CREATED_AT , UPDATED_AT FROM PAYMENT WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND PAYMENT_TYPE = 'PAYMENT' AND REMAIN_REFUNDABLE_AMOUNT > 0 ORDER BY PAYMENT_NO ASC
